title: Python Scripts
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : Python Scripts**

Following is a list of [Python](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Python) scripts for [FontLab](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontLab) to aid in the font development process:

[fontQA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/fontQA)  
 [Interpolated Nudge](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/betatype.com/node/18) from [Christian Robertson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Robertson)  
 [Font Remix Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/tools/RMX/) from [Tim Ahrens](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tim%20Ahrens)  
 [Automatic Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/code.unicoders.org/hacks/trunk/automatic_text.py) from [Antonio Cavedoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Antonio%20Cavedoni)  
 [PixelBrush](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/www.gustavoferreira.com/tiki-index.php?page=PixelBrush) from [Hartmut Bohnacker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hartmut%20Bohnacker)  
 [OpenType Production](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/www.kltf.de/kltf_otproduction.htm) scripts from [Karsten Luecke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Karsten%20Luecke)

**Discussion:**  
 [Small Release of Several Python Scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/node/17596)  
 [Automatic Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415033017/http:/typophile.com/node/38539)
author: paul d hunt
